body_html: Just to be clear, I never wanted to say that we should stop running nn tests in asan forever. They’re great. I just meant that adding this patch could add a false sense that we’re still ok, and we could leave it for a while, but we really shouldn’t.
body_text: Just to be clear, I never wanted to say that we should stop running nn tests in asan forever. They’re great. I just meant that adding this patch could add a false sense that we’re still ok, and we could leave it for a while, but we really shouldn’t.
body: Just to be clear, I never wanted to say that we should stop running nn tests in asan forever. They’re great. I just meant that adding this patch could add a false sense that we’re still ok, and we could leave it for a while, but we really shouldn’t.
